Posted By: David McDonald
Hi Rob-
I would like the M116 Leach, the M116 Lobert (#2) and the Obak Householder.  E-mail on the way.  BTW your ImageEvent galleries are FANTASTIC ; especially liked the array of M116s, D304s (natch), and it's great to see all the T209-1's in one place (any dupes???).  Also, your set of T206 backs is most edifying (although it got me wondering who's on the front of the cards).
David McD.

Posted By: Bob
Rob- I'll take the T210-5 Dobard.
tbob

Posted By: robert a
Guys,

I'm going through the emails to see who emailed first for the cards.

Please don't send any payments until I've contacted you with the card's availability.

Obviously, it's first come first served.

I'll get back to everyone shortly and THANKS for your interest!

Rob

Posted By: robert a
All cards that are paid for were shipped today.

I've lowered all the prices on the cards that are for sale.  

Please email if you'd like to purchase.

Added a 1909 Obak McCardle SGC 20

Thanks!

Rob

Posted By: chris
Do you still have EAGAN CINCINNATI,NATIONALS M116 for sale?

Posted By: robert a
Chris,

It's on hold for another collector but not paid for yet.

Please email me so I have your email address.  If you're still interested and the other collector's not, I'll contact you asap.

Thanks for your interest!

Rob
